link-text: UpGoer Your Ph.D.: I pretend things for my job. Really I tell the computer what to...
link-description:
upgoeryourphd:

I pretend things for my job. Really I tell the computer what to pretend and it pretends much better than just me. But I have to pretend too, to make sure the computer is doing it right, because the computer does not know much about pretend. There are stars out in space that are very big, much…

"I pretend things for my job", poetry.
